releaseNotes: General bug fixes and other performance improvements.
description:
Experience the thrill of a brand-new post-apocalyptic zombie shooter. Step into an infested world overrun by the undead and fight to survive in the most intense zombie battle yet!

ZOMBIE STATE is a mobile survival game that seamlessly blends the FPS and roguelike genres together. 

Fight your way through hordes of zombies, discover random weapon drops with each run, and tackle a variety of scenarios that will make each playthrough feel fresh and unpredictable. 

Dive into this Zombie FPS game and enjoy dynamic zombie-shooting gameplay, where you can:

- Blast your way through zombies with incredibly detailed 3D weapons
- Enjoy a one-of-a-kind experience combining FPS with Roguelike elements
- Discover diverse regions and game modes, exploring unique locations
- Tackle fresh challenges to unravel the secrets of the apocalypse
- Immerse yourself in FPS gameplay with stunning visuals
___

UNIQUE FUSION OF FIRST-PERSON SHOOTER AND ROGUELIKE
Each run has the potential to unlock the most powerful version of your hero. Experiment with each character’s abilities and talents to discover new synergies. Find new weapons along the way and customize your loadout to maximize your power. With endless builds, you’ll never take your finger off the trigger!

RICH ARSENAL OF WEAPONS AND EQUIPMENT
Complete missions to obtain a vast collection of powerful weapons and unique gear. Blast and shoot through zombies with meticulously detailed 3D guns. Boost your strength with exclusive equipment and become the ultimate survivor.

A WORLD FULL OF MONSTERS
Along the way, you will encounter zombies with all sorts of mutations. Study their habits, find their weaknesses, and face off against terrifying boss monsters to earn valuable rewards. 

EXPERIENCE THE DIVERSITY OF EACH REGION
No two levels are the same — explore a variety of regions and game modes, each with unique locations plagued by zombies.

CHOOSE YOUR HERO
Step into the action with a roster of heroes, each equipped with a special set of skills. Whether you’re a tactical sniper or prefer the excitement of close combat, there's a hero to match your style.

THE SECRETS OF THE APOCALYPSE
This world is full of mysteries. Take on new challenges to uncover the story behind the post-apocalyptic state.

Download ZOMBIE STATE now and experience the ultimate FPS zombie shooting adventure!
___

INFORMATION
● Official Facebook page: https://www.facebook.com/ZombieStateGame 
● Official Discord: https://discord.gg/FHrDX4h5mq 
● Official YouTube channel: https://www.youtube.com/@zombiestategame
___

VIP Access is a weekly subscription service that provides access to another hero, a legendary sidearm, 3 legendary main weapons, an extra weapon at the start of each mission and free revives. It also grants additional rewards from the daily login bonus, an increased energy limit, and enhanced mission bonuses and rewards:

Infinite ammo
+250 HP
+250 Attack
+50% Bucks
+50% Experience

VIP Access costs $6.99 per week (or the local equivalent) and will be charged to your iTunes Account upon purchase and at the start of each weekly renewal period.

Payment is charged to your iTunes Account upon purchase confirmation. Subscriptions automatically renew unless auto-renewal is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Your account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period at the rate of your selected plan.

You can manage your subscription and turn off auto-renewal in your Account Settings after purchase. Cancellation of the current subscription is not allowed during the active subscription period.

Brought to you by MY.GAMES B.V.
